title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 210.17 - Rearrangement or shortening of program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 210.17 - Rearrangement or shortening of program

State Regulations

In the event of threatening weather or rain, an outdoor
contest or exhibition may be rearranged or shortened by the promoter with the
approval of the Commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
210.17

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
